column4: i am having problem when using ubuntu 8.04, it seems that when i start the networking the whole computer work slow VERY SLOW, it take years to open applications..., when i dont start the network it work just fine, what could be the problem?
wols_:nothing use the cpu, it seems like it wait for sometime out...., the network is just wired network, when it not connect the machine work fast
after applications get opened they work fast...
i'd double check the ip mask dns and gtwy numbers
